description.para: Sets notification state and triggers event notification.

param_note.para: Specifies the notification state value; a non-zero unsigned integer. By default, it is SIGNALED.

tr.td: Function succeeds in setting the state and triggering event notification.

remarks.para: The method specifies a notification state and wakes up the waiting thread. If the event object is auto cleared, then it will wake up only one waiting thread, and the notification will be cleared. If the event object is manual cleared, then it will wake up all the waiting threads, and it will keep the notification until the IEvent::Clear method is called. If there is non waiting thread on the event object, calling the method just makes the event object notified state.

system.system_name: Windows 2000 or later; Elastos 2.0 or later.
